title: Glen of the Downs nature reserve to expand as State buys over 40 hectares of adjoining land
description: The Glen of the Downs is designated as a Special Area of Conservation for the habitat old sessile oak woods and is one of Ireland’s few remaining ancient woodlands.
content:
THE GLEN OF the Downs nature reserve in Co Wicklow is to be expanded after the State purchased over 40 hectares of land adjoining the ancient oak woodland.

title: Glen of the Downs Nature Reserve to expand
description: One of Ireland's best known oak woodlands will increase in size by 68% after the State bought 100 acres (40.46 hectares) of land beside the Glen of the Downs nature reserve in Co Wicklow.
